verses.name: Genesis 34:8
verses.text: And Hamor communed with them, saying, The soul of my son Shechem longeth for your daughter: I pray you give her him to wife.

verses.name: Genesis 34:9
verses.text: And make ye marriages with us, and give your daughters unto us, and take our daughters unto you.

verses.name: Genesis 34:10
verses.text: And ye shall dwell with us: and the land shall be before you; dwell and trade ye therein, and get you possessions therein.

verses.name: Genesis 34:11
verses.text: And Shechem said unto her father and unto her brethren, Let me find grace in your eyes, and what ye shall say unto me I will give.
